price: Were We wearied by their first creation? No indeed, yet they are in confusion concerning the second creation.
arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلۡخَلۡقِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي لَبۡسٖ مِّنۡ خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
